reviewText:
This thing is great; it is all in Japanese, of which my vocabulary consists of "hamchanzu" and a couple of other Hamutaro remarks. But, I am enjoying it tremendously! I hope someday to understand it.

Sweet Paradise and the Jewel house are important in these four episodes. The fashionable Oshare appears in an interestesting episode; Boss and the hamchanzu try to teach her how to be a "working class" Ham.

It is a Region 2 DVD; be sure your player plays Japanese stuff.
